Text: Re Energy Project minor little detailpst Youre sending biz emails at on Saturday morning You must have kidsat any rate thanks for the note Am glad things worked out well and that you were so flexible re schedulinglet me know if you need anything going forward as I assume you will beand if I dont talk to you try to have a terrific holiday mb Marcy Brinegar MBM Consultants Office Cell fax

Fwd Energy Project minor little detailpst And the time of this meeting would be Which leaves you plenty of time to wrap up your document reading Marcy Brinegar MBM Consultants fax Inline attachment follows From To Buy Rick OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNRBUY Date Thursday December GMT Subject Hi RickIf you dont mind Lyns asked that you join him at The Hyatt am thinking the bar might just come in handyin front of the escalator in the lobby As I indicated hes has reddish hair and is purported to be rather muscular Hope youre preparing a description for mewill call you shortly to confirm Hes aware that youre suitlessand the resumes not even remotely an issue Talk to you soonthx mb Marcy Brinegar MBM Consultants fax

Re Energy Projectpst Hi RickIf you dont mind Lyns asked that you join him at The Hyatt am thinking the bar might just come in handyin front of the escalator in the lobby As I indicated hes has reddish hair and is purported to be rather muscular Hope youre preparing a description for mewill call you shortly to confirm Hes aware that youre suitlessand the resumes not even remotely an issue Talk to you soonthx mb Marcy Brinegar MBM Consultants fax

Energy Projectpst Dear Rick Just a quick followup to my voice mail of earlier this afternoon I represent an Executive Search Firm based in Atlanta and have been retained by an international leader in the energy industry to pursue Directorlevel talent as it happens my client has recently indicated an express interest in speaking with you Since Id imagine youve been inundated with calls and emails similar to mine in an effort to eliminate any confusion I should tell you that we tried to contact you yesterday my associate Michael Allen left you a voice mail I understand that the environment at Enron must be a challenging one at this point however if youre interested in talkinglistening and are in a position to take a short break the PresidentCOO of my client company is in Houston today and is curious as to whether youd by some remote chance be free this afternoon or evening for a brief chat I realize that this is highly unorthodox but also feel that standing on ceremony is perhaps not always the most prudent approach Ill wait to hear from you in regard to your interest leveland if youre not available today as Im assuming to be the case we can obviously reschedule for a time thats a bit more reasonable Thanks Sincerely Marcy Brinegar MBM Consultants fax
